==Syncronization==
_Files provided by "intheam"_
file:///home/batan/.task/private.certificate.pem
file:///home/batan/.task/private.key.pem
file:///home/batan/.task/ca.cert.pem
_config by "intheam"_
add the following to:
/home/batan/.taskrc
<code>
taskd.certificate=/path/to/private.certificate.pem
taskd.key=/path/to/private.key.pem
taskd.ca=/path/to/ca.cert.pem
taskd.server=inthe.am:53589
taskd.credentials=inthe_am/tel.petar/a2b0048a-7b75-41b6-a00e-1a7fb60ef4f1
taskd.trust=strict
</code>
Syncing for the first time, run:
<code>task sync init</code>
Syncing as per usual:
<code>sync task</code>
